entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain before morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023
